thread.section_title: The Inn at Irving Place - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Marvellous!
thread.title_full: Marvellous! - Review of The Inn at Irving Place, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: whukap
title: Marvellous!
text:
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.
Unlike most NY hotels our room was very spacious. Plenty of room for cases and ample storage by way of wardrobe/drawers. Again, bathroom on the large size.
Warm, friendly, helpful staff that couldn't do more to help.
Boutique-y style of hotel, tastefully decorated. Great location.
Basic continental breakfast available so best head out to one of the many diners.
